decision_conditions: Only amendments which are subject to Schedule 17 approval are considered under this application for non-material changes to the vehicle and pedestrian access at the entrance to the U46 footpath, at its junction with Breakspear Road South, replacing a bollard approved as part of the original scheme.

The proposals are considered to represent an approval the authority could have given originally and are considered to be non-material. As such, the application is recommended for approval, in accordance with Schedule 17, Part 1, Paragraph 21 (Non-material changes to approvals), of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 72870/APP/2022/2692, dated 10-11-2022 (HS2 request for approval of Plans and Specifications under condition imposed by Schedule 17 to the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017, relating to a site area of 65,977.4m2 comprising; the realignment of approx. 96m of the River Pinn with associated works including a new footbridge, a flood compensation area, drainage stepped outlets, outfalls, ditches, access stairs and fencing; an attenuation pond for the approved Gatemead Embankment track drainage with an associated road vehicle parking area, access junction and fencing; and two further access junctions for maintenance access with associated access strips and fencing.) The amendments relate to the replacement of a removable bollard with vehicle and pedestrian gates at the footpath entrance.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
